fill_all_fields: Please fill in all fields before adding the customer.
customers_details: Select a client to see their details.
instructions_body:
Tap the "+" button to add a new customer.

Select a customer to view details or delete.

All data is saved to a local database.

Tap the house button to go back to the main page.
